#ica21 reviewer tips
this one is especially important because many of our colleagues, since it is an INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE, are not native speakers of english! imo, in a review setting, grammar is only worth mentioning if it completely prohibits comprehension. https://t.co/3VtPH60MnM
This is also the @icahdq official position as discussed at board meetings. Review the content, not the grammar. We are an international association. https://t.co/r3et61hlTe

My reviewing tips 
for #ica21
Be kind and thoughtful

I‚Äôve come to the realization that the problem isn‚Äôt w/ virtual conferences - it‚Äôs not getting time away from other responsibilities. We‚Äôre still teaching, grading, attending class, making dinner, etc - I failed to block off a few days for #NCA20 like I would have if I was in Indy

Just finished my @ICA_CSaB reviews. I was BLOWN AWAY by the innovativeness and quality of the scholarship. It was a true delight to read each submission. @ICA_CSaB continues to attract some of the most exciting @icahdq scholarship. #ica21 is going to be a great! Also......

.....that my reviews are done means I have some extra bandwidth. This year is hard for so many people in so many different ways. If you don't have the bandwidth to complete your reviews this year, let me and/or @allison_eden know. I'll gladly take on your @ICA_CSaB review #ica21
NOw that we've done virtual #ica20 and have announced virtual #ica21, all that's keeping me going at this point is the certainty that #ICA22 in Paris is going to be LIT. https://t.co/o6BpI6J5xK

Because of @katypearce raving reviews of #AoIR2020 I became its newest member and visited the online conference last night. I was not disappointed: If someone knows how to do online conferencing it is the Association of Internet Research. Here are some things that worked for me:

tweets.text: Dear @icahdq folks -- We've decided to make #ica21 100% virtual. Take a look at the announcement if you haven't already. @LSawyerED Sending you strength right now during your busy time.  And, I think the choice about ICA was perfect. All most of us want right now is a little bit of certainty, and you helped provide it.
